name: EQUINOX SOCIAL WELFARE FOUNDATION
briefDescription: We started with Handicap identify & Card issue program in association with "Shelter" in 2011.Then we did Street Awareness Program for women and girls empowerment in 2013.Then we worked on Educational & Technological supports for the rural areas, in association with Raghnathpur Career Plus Academy in 2012, 2013,  2014 & 2015. To provide computer literacy in software and hardware from rural areas.Now we working on Child Protection is about protecting children from or against any perceived or real danger or risk to their life, their person-hood and childhood with the help of State Child Protection Unit, West Bengal Government.And also working on Social Audit with the help of concerned department of West Bengal Government.
